alert.note: Alert for San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 21 at 8:39AM MST until December 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one to two miles in freezing fog. * WHERE...San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands, Southwest Mountains, West Central Highlands, West Central Mountains, and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
